description: The Chinese ground orchid (Bletilla striata f. gebina) is an amazing species with a lot to offer. Its bright pink flowers blossom each summer, producing a beautiful display of color. It's also highly adaptable and low maintenance, able to tolerate a range of growing conditions. Its tuberous root system helps grow the plant in shady areas and even in rocky terrain, making it an ideal choice for gardeners looking for something a bit different. Plus, its fragrant flowers are especially attractive to pollinators, creating a hummingbird and butterfly paradise. With its exotic beauty and ease of care, the Chinese ground orchid is an ideal choice for any garden.
